name: AncestryClone
versionDescription: Initial release with comprehensive iPad support including optimized UI, multi-window support, and enhanced tree visualization.
localizedDescription: AncestryClone helps you build and explore your family tree with an intuitive interface optimized for both iPhone and iPad.

permissions.usageDescription: AncestryClone needs access to your photos to add existing photos to your family tree.
AncestryClone needs camera access to scan documents and take photos for your family tree.
This allows us to provide a better, personalized experience.

subtitle: Explore your family history
